::Hevn::

     He shakes his head.  "I wouldn't worry too much.  We're in no danger as long as you remain loyal.  I have no intention of betraying any faction you belong to.  I failed to rescue you when i should have.  The least I can do is keep you from physical harm.  Wherever you go, I will follow."  He stands up and raises his majestic black body to it's full height.  "It is my duty and my honor."

<P>::Hevn::</P>
<P>     He shakes his head.  "I wouldn't worry too much.  We're in no danger as long as you remain loyal.  I have no intention of betraying any faction you belong to.  I failed to rescue you when i should have.  The least I can do is keep you from physical harm.  Wherever you go, I will follow."  He stands up and raises his majestic black body to it's full height.  "It is my duty and my honor."</P><p><hr SIZE=1>
